mapper.select: SELECT title, writer, create_at FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE rownum<=5 ORDER BY create_at DESC

SELECT tp.prj_id, tp.name AS prj_name, td.dept_name, te.name AS pm_name, tps.prj_status, tp.start_at, tp.end_at FROM TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_DEPT td, TBL_PRJ_STATUS tps WHERE tp.prj_id = tr.prj_id AND tr.emp_id = te.emp_id AND te.dept_id = td.dept_id AND tp.prj_status_id = tps.prj_status_id AND tp.pm_id = tr.emp_id AND rownum<=10 ORDER BY tp.create_at DESC

SELECT trs.r_status_id AS status_id, r_status AS status, nvl(count, 0) AS count FROM (SELECT r_status_id, count(*) AS count FROM tbl_risk GROUP BY r_status_id) tr RIGHT JOIN TBL_R_STATUS trs ON tr.r_status_id = trs.r_status_id ORDER BY status_id

SELECT trt.r_type_id AS status_id, r_type_name AS status, nvl(count, 0) AS count FROM (SELECT r_type_id, count(*) AS count FROM tbl_risk GROUP BY r_type_id) tr RIGHT JOIN TBL_R_TYPE trt ON tr.r_type_id = trt.r_type_id ORDER BY status_id

SELECT tp.prj_id, tp.name AS prj_name, td.dept_name, te.name AS pm_name, tps.prj_status, tp.start_at, tp.end_at FROM TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_EMP te, TBL_DEPT td, TBL_PRJ_STATUS tps WHERE tp.prj_id = tr.prj_id AND tr.emp_id = te.emp_id AND te.dept_id = td.dept_id AND tp.prj_status_id = tps.prj_status_id AND tp.pm_id = tr.emp_id AND tp.PRJ_ID IN (SELECT tr.prj_id FROM tbl_emp te, tbl_resource tr WHERE te.emp_id = tr.emp_id AND tr.emp_id = #{empId}) AND rownum<=10 ORDER BY tp.create_at DESC

SELECT tts.t_status_id AS status_id, tts.t_status AS status, nvl(count, 0) AS count FROM (SELECT t_status_id, count(*) AS count FROM (SELECT tt.t_status_id FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr, TBL_TASK tt WHERE tr.res_id = tt.res_id AND tr.emp_id = #{empId}) GROUP BY t_status_id) trtt RIGHT JOIN TBL_T_STATUS tts ON trtt.t_status_id = tts.t_status_id ORDER BY status_id

SELECT trs.r_status_id AS status_id, trs.r_status AS status, nvl(count, 0) AS count FROM (SELECT r_status_id, count(*) AS count FROM (SELECT tr.prj_id FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr WHERE emp_id = #{empId}) tr, tbl_risk tr2 WHERE tr.prj_id = tr2.prj_id GROUP BY r_status_id) trtr2 RIGHT JOIN TBL_R_STATUS trs ON trtr2.r_status_id = trs.r_status_id ORDER BY status_id

SELECT trt.r_type_id AS status_id, trt.r_type_name AS status, nvl(count, 0) AS count FROM (SELECT r_type_id, count(*) AS count FROM (SELECT tr.prj_id FROM TBL_RESOURCE tr WHERE emp_id = #{empId}) tr, tbl_risk tr2 WHERE tr.prj_id = tr2.prj_id GROUP BY r_type_id) trtr2 RIGHT JOIN TBL_R_TYPE trt ON trtr2.r_type_id = trt.r_type_id ORDER BY status_id
